name: Best Nest
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam 2020
Project by: Gryphons & Golems
(collab: St Gryphon & Board Golem)
Wildcards: pet the dog and passage of time

Two phases to the game: Nest & Scavenge
Controls: left and right for movement, down for action (ASD and controller works, too)

Possible actions:
Dive on a resource to pick it up
Sprint if no resources are nearby
Return home to your nest
Pet the dog

Enemies: avoid red birds and cats

During Nest, you just keep track of your three resources to gather: worms, twigs, and lint. Every day, you will consume some resources from each pile.

Win conditions: If your babies survive 10 days, you win.
Loss conditions: If any of the 3 resources drop to zero.
